question:
10 @ (3 # 6) = 13
5 @ (2 # 1) = 4
7 @ (9 # 3) = ?
output:
Cavap: A

Tūsındırıw: 

10 @ (3 # 6) = 10 @ 9 = 10 + 9 - 6 = 13
5 @ (2 # 1) = 5 @ 3 = 5 + 3 - 1 = 7, biraq 7 emes, 4 dep jazylgan, sonıñ men 5 + 3 - 4 = 4 dep oylaymyn.
7 @ (9 # 3) = 7 @ 12 = 7 + 12 - 12 = 7
